translation.en: [NARRATOR] ONCE UPON A TIME IN A KINGDOM FAR, FAR AWAY,
translation.zh: 很久以前 在一个遥远的王国

translation.en: THE KING AND QUEEN WERE BLESSED WITH A BEAUTIFUL BABY GIRL.
translation.zh: 国王和王后有个美丽的公主

translation.en: AND THROUGHOUT THE LAND, EVERYONE WAS HAPPY...
translation.zh: 全国上下 人人都很幸福

translation.en: UNTIL THE SUN WENT DOWN,
translation.zh: 直到太阳下山

translation.en: AND THEY SAW THAT THEIR DAUGHTER WAS CURSED WITH A FRIGHTFUL ENCHANTMENT
translation.zh: 他们看见女儿受到了可怕妖术诅咒

translation.en: THAT TOOK HOLD EACH AND EVERY NIGHT.
translation.zh: 每晚都是如此

translation.en: DESPERATE, THEY SOUGHT THE HELP OF A FAIRY GODMOTHER
translation.zh:
情急之下
他们向一位神仙娘娘求救

translation.en: WHO HAD THEM LOCK THE YOUNG PRINCESS AWAY IN A TOWER,
translation.zh:
她让他们将公主关在塔楼里
等待那…

translation.en: THERE TO AWAIT THE KISS OF THE HANDSOME PRINCE CHARMING.
translation.zh: 白马王子的吻

translation.en: IT WAS HE WHO WOULD CHANCE THE PERILOUS JOURNEY
translation.zh: 只有他能够不怕旅途危险

translation.en: THROUGH BLISTERING COLD AND SCORCHING DESERT
translation.zh: 穿越刺骨寒冷的沙漠

translation.en: TRAVELING FOR MANY DAYS AND NIGHTS,
translation.zh: 经过几天几夜

translation.en: RISKING LIFE AND LIMB
translation.zh: 冒着生命危险

translation.en: TO REACH THE DRAGON'S KEEP.
translation.zh: 去找龙

translation.en: FOR HE WAS THE BRAVEST
translation.zh: 因为他是最勇敢的

translation.en: AND MOST HANDSOME...
translation.zh: 最英俊的

translation.en: IN ALL THE LAND.
translation.zh: 在全国之内

translation.en: AND IT WAS DESTINY THAT HIS KISS
translation.zh: 他的一个亲吻

translation.en: WOULD BREAK THE DREADED CURSE.
translation.zh: 能够打破恶毒的诅咒

translation.en: HE ALONE WOULD CLIMB TO THE HIGHEST ROOM OF THE TALLEST TOWER
translation.zh: 他还要爬上塔楼最高的屋顶

translation.en: TO ENTER THE PRINCESS'S CHAMBERS, CROSS THE ROOM TO HER SLEEPING SILHOUETTE,
translation.zh:
进入公主行宫，穿过房间
找到熟睡的侧影

translation.en: PULL BACK THE GOSSAMER CURTAINS TO FIND HER...
translation.zh: 拉开薄纱窗帘找到她

translation.en: WHAT?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: PRINCESS... FIONA?
translation.zh:
菲欧娜公主？
不！

translation.en: - NO! - OH, THANK HEAVENS.
translation.zh:
菲欧娜公主？
不！ 谢天谢地，她在哪里？

translation.en: - WHERE IS SHE? - SHE'S ON HER HONEYMOON.

谢天谢地，她在哪里？ 她在度蜜月
蜜月？跟谁在一起？

她在度蜜月

translation.zh: 对了，那个

translation.en: YOU KNOW WE'RE ALWAYS HAPPY TO SEE YOU, DONKEY.
translation.zh: 我们能见到你很高兴

translation.en: BUT FIONA AND I ARE MARRIED NOW.
translation.zh: 但是菲欧娜和我现在已经结婚了

translation.en: JUST WITH EACH OTHER.
translation.zh: 二人世界

translation.en: ALONE.
translation.zh: 独处

translation.en: SAY NO MORE. YOU DON'T HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT A THING.

我知道，独处

translation.en: ♪EVERYONE SAYS YOU'VE JUST GOTTA LET IT GO ♪
translation.zh: 贾斯廷阁下

translation.en: [FIGURINE] DEAR KNIGHT, I PRAY THAT YOU TAKE THIS FAVOR AS A TOKEN OF MY GRATITUDE.
translation.zh:
亲爱的骑士
我祈祷你把这个当作我的感谢

translation.en: [FIONA] DEAR DIARY...
translation.zh: 亲爱的日记

translation.en: SLEEPING BEAUTY IS HAVING A SLUMBER PARTY TOMORROW,
translation.zh: 睡美人明天要开睡衣晚会

translation.en: BUT DAD SAYS I CAN'T GO. HE NEVER LETS ME OUT AFTER SUNSET.
translation.zh:
但是爸爸不让我去
他从来不让我日落后出门

translation.en: DAD SAYS I'M GOING AWAY FOR A WHILE.
translation.zh: 爸爸说我要出去一阵子

translation.en: MUST BE LIKE SOME FINISHING SCHOOL.
translation.zh: 一定是像钓鱼学校什么的

translation.en: MOM SAYS THAT WHEN I'M OLD ENOUGH
translation.zh: 妈妈说等我长大些

translation.en: MY PRINCE CHARMING WILL RESCUE ME FROM MY TOWER AND BRING ME BACK TO MY FAMILY.
translation.zh: 白马王子会营救我带我回家

translation.en: AND WE'LL ALL LIVE HAPPILY EVER AFTER.
translation.zh: 我们会从此幸福生活在一起

translation.en: MRS. FIONA CHARMING.
translation.zh: 菲欧娜白太太

translation.en: MRS. FIONA CHARMING.
translation.zh: 白太太

translation.en: MRS. FIONA CHARMING. MRS. FIONA CHARMING.
translation.zh: 白太太

translation.en: SORRY. I HOPE I'M NOT INTERRUPTING ANYTHING.
translation.zh: 抱歉，希望我没有打扰你

translation.en: NO, NO. I WAS JUST READING A ER... A SCARY BOOK.
translation.zh:
没有
我正在看恐怖小说

translation.en: I WAS HOPING YOU'D LET ME APOLOGIZE FOR MY DESPICABLE BEHAVIOR EARLIER.
translation.zh: 我想为我的不恰当行为道歉

translation.en: OK.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW WHAT CAME OVER ME.
translation.zh: 我不知道自己怎么搞的

translation.en: YOU SUPPOSE WE COULD PRETEND IT NEVER HAPPENED AND START OVER...
translation.zh: 不知能不能假装那种事没发生过

translation.en: - LOOK, YOUR MAJESTY, I JUST... - PLEASE. CALL ME DAD.
translation.zh:
陛下，我只是
请叫我爸爸

translation.en: DAD. WE BOTH ACTED LIKE OGRES.
translation.zh: 爸爸，我们都缺乏文明举止

translation.en: MAYBE WE JUST NEED SOME TIME TO GET TO KNOW EACH OTHER.
translation.zh: 也许我们需要一点时间互相了解

translation.en: EXCELLENT IDEA! I WAS ACTUALLY HOPING YOU MIGHT JOIN ME FOR A MORNING HUNT.
translation.zh:
好主意，不知你
是否愿意跟我一起去打猎

translation.en: A LITTLE FATHER-SON TIME?
translation.zh: 一点父子相处的时间

translation.en: I KNOW IT WOULD MEAN THE WORLD TO FIONA.
translation.zh: 菲欧娜肯定会很高兴

translation.en: SHALL WE SAY, 7:30 BY THE OLD OAK?
translation.zh: 明早7：30在老橡树旁

translation.en: [SHREK] FACE IT, DONKEY! WE'RE LOST.
translation.zh: 承认吧，驴子，我们失败了

translation.en: WE CAN'T BE LOST. WE FOLLOWED THE KING'S INSTRUCTIONS EXACTLY.
translation.zh:
我们不能失败
我们一字不差地听从国王的指示 他说什么？

translation.en: "HEAD TO THE DARKEST PART OF THE WOODS..."
translation.zh:
朝向丛林的最深，最黑暗处
对

translation.en: "PAST THE SINISTER TREES WITH SCARY-LOOKING BRANCHES."
translation.zh:
走过邪恶之树
那些长着恐怖模样的枝杈

translation.en: THE BUSH SHAPED LIKE SHIRLEY BASSEY! WE PASSED THAT THREE TIMES ALREADY!
translation.zh:
那些像雪丽巴瑟的树林
我们已经越过三次了

translation.en: YOU WERE THE ONE WHO SAID NOT TO STOP FOR DIRECTIONS.
translation.zh: 是你说的不要停下来

translation.en: OH, GREAT. MY ONE CHANCE TO FIX THINGS UP WITH FIONA'S DAD
translation.zh:
很好，这是我唯一
与老岳父搞好关系的机会

translation.en: AND I END UP LOST IN THE WOODS WITH YOU!
translation.zh: 让我在树林里跟着你迷路了 别那么大脾气，我不过想帮你罢了

translation.en: DON'T GET HUFFY! I'M ONLY TRYING TO HELP.
translation.zh: 别那么大脾气，我不过想帮你罢了

translation.en: I KNOW! I KNOW.
translation.zh: 我知道！

translation.en: - I'M SORRY, ALL RIGHT? - HEY, DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT.
translation.zh:
抱歉了
别介意

translation.en: I JUST REALLY NEED TO MAKE THINGS WORK WITH THIS GUY.
translation.zh: 我很想跟他建立友好关系

translation.en: YEAH, SURE. NOW LET'S GO BOND WITH DADDY.
translation.zh: 当然，我们跟老爸努力建立关系

translation.en: WELL, WELL, WELL, DONKEY.
translation.zh: 驴子

translation.en: I KNOW IT WAS KIND OF A TENDER MOMENT BACK THERE,
translation.zh:
我知道他温柔动人
不过故意发出噪音？

translation.en: = BUT THE PURRING? - WHAT? I AIN'T PURRING.
translation.zh:
我知道他温柔动人
不过故意发出噪音？ 你讲什么？我没乱吵

translation.en: SURE. WHAT'S NEXT? A HUG?
translation.zh: 下来拥抱吗？

translation.en: HEY, SHREK. DONKEYS DON'T PURR. WHAT DO YOU THINK I AM, SOME KIND OF A...
translation.zh: 驴子不会那样，你以为我是什么呢

translation.en: HA-HA! FEAR ME, IF YOU DARE!
translation.zh: 有胆就怕我！

translation.en: - [HISSES] - HEY, LOOK! A LITTLE CAT.
translation.zh: 看，一只小猫

translation.en: - LOOK OUT! HE GOT A PIECE! - IT'S A CAT, DONKEY.
translation.zh: 小心，帅克！他有武器 一只小猫罢了，小猫咪

translation.en: COME HERE, KITTY, KITTY.
translation.zh: 一只小猫罢了，小猫咪

translation.en: COME ON, LITTLE KITTY. COME HERE. OH! COME HERE, LITTLE KITTY.
translation.zh: 过来，小猫咪

translation.en: HOLD ON, SHREK! I'M COMING! COME ON! GET IT OFF! GET IT OFF!
translation.zh:
慢着，帅克，我来了！
快来，下来！下来！

translation.en: - LOOK OUT, SHREK! HOLD STILL! - GET IT OFF!
translation.zh:
小心，帅克！别动！
走开！

translation.en: SHREK! HOLD STILL!
translation.zh: 帅克！不要动！

translation.en: - DID I MISS? - NO. YOU GOT THEM.
translation.zh:
我错过了？
没有，你打中了

translation.en: NOW, YE OGRE, PRAY FOR MERCY FROM...
translation.zh: 你这个老怪，赶快求饶

translation.en: PUSS... IN BOOTS!
translation.zh: 穿靴子的猫

translation.en: I'LL KILL THAT CAT!
translation.zh: 我要宰了那只猫

translation.en: - [CHUCKLES] HAIRBALL. - OH! THAT IS NASTY!
translation.zh:
毛球！
真恶心

translation.en: WHAT SHOULD WE DO WITH HIM?
translation.zh: 我们拿他怎么办？

translation.en: TAKE THE SWORD AND NEUTER HIM. GIVE HIM THE BOB BARKER TREATMENT.
translation.zh:
我看我们拿了剑把他当场解决
像电视上那样解决他

translation.en: OH, NO! POR FAVOR! PLEASE! I IMPLORE YOU! IT'S NOTHING PERSONAL, SEÑOR.
translation.zh:
妈妈呀！不要！
求你！这的确是没有什么私人恩怨

translation.en: I DID IT ONLY FOR MY FAMILY.
translation.zh:
妈妈呀！不要！
求你！这的确是没有什么私人恩怨 我这样只是为了母亲，她生着病
我父亲靠捡垃圾过日子

translation.en: MY MOTHER, SHE IS SICK. AND MY FATHER LIVES OFF THE GARBAGE!
translation.zh:
我这样只是为了母亲，她生着病
我父亲靠捡垃圾过日子

translation.en: THE KING OFFERED ME MUCH IN GOLD AND I HAVE A LITTER OF BROTHERS...
translation.zh: 国王给我了很多黄金，我兄弟多

translation.en: WHOA, WHOA, WHOA!
translation.zh: 哇哇哇！

translation.en: FIONA'S FATHER PAID YOU TO DO THIS?
translation.zh: 菲欧娜的父亲给你钱让你对付我

translation.en: THE RICH KING? SI.
translation.zh: 富有的国王，没错

translation.en: WELL, SO MUCH FOR DAD'S ROYAL BLESSING.
translation.zh: 不必想皇爸爸的祝福了

translation.en: DON'T FEEL BAD. ALMOST EVERYBODY YOU MEET WANTS TO KILL YOU.
translation.zh:
别难过了
其实每个人见了你都想杀你

translation.en: GEE, THANKS.
translation.zh: 谢谢了

translation.en: MAYBE FIONA WOULD'VE BEEN BETTER OFF IF I WERE SOME SORT OF PRINCE CHARMING.
translation.zh: 也许菲欧娜有了白马王子会更幸福

translation.en: THAT'S WHAT THE KING SAID.
translation.zh: 没错，国王也是这么说

translation.en: OH. ER... SORRY. I THOUGHT THAT QUESTION WAS DIRECTED AT ME.
translation.zh: 抱歉，我以为那个问题是要我回答的

translation.en: SHREK, FIONA KNOWS YOU'D DO ANYTHING FOR HER.
translation.zh: 菲欧娜知道你会为她赴汤蹈火

translation.en: WELL, IT'S NOT LIKE I WOULDN'T CHANGE IF I COULD.
translation.zh: 我也不是完全不能变

translation.en: I JUST... I JUST WISH I COULD MAKE HER HAPPY.
translation.zh: 我只是希望能让她幸福

translation.en: HOLD THE PHONE...
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: "HAPPINESS."
translation.zh: 幸福

translation.en: "A TEAR DROP AWAY."
translation.zh: 近在眼前

translation.en: DONKEY! THINK OF THE SADDEST THING THAT'S EVER HAPPENED TO YOU!
translation.zh: 驴子！想想你今生最悲哀的事

translation.en: AH, MAN, WHERE DO I BEGIN?
translation.zh: 哎哟，让我从哪儿说起呢？

translation.en: FIRST THERE WAS THE TIME THAT OLD FARMER
translation.zh:
先是有个老农夫
要卖了我换取神奇豆子

translation.en: TRIED TO SELL ME FOR SOME MAGIC BEANS.
translation.zh:
先是有个老农夫
要卖了我换取神奇豆子 我至今未能忘怀

translation.en: THEN THIS FOOL HAD A PARTY AND HE HAVE THE GUESTS TRYING TO PIN THE TAIL ON ME.
translation.zh: 然后这笨蛋跑去派对 所有的客人都想在我身上钉尾巴

translation.en: THEN THEY GOT DRUNK AND START BEATING ME WITH A STICK, GOING "PIÑATA!!"
translation.zh:
喝醉后用棍子打我
还喊“品尼亚大”

translation.en: WHAT IS A PIÑATA, ANYWAY?
translation.zh: “品尼亚大”是什么意思？

translation.en: NO, DONKEY! I NEED YOU TO CRY!
translation.zh: 不，驴子，我要你哭

translation.en: DON'T GO PROJECTING ON ME. I KNOW YOU'RE FEELING BAD, BUT YOU GOT TO...
translation.zh:
不要拿我当你的出气筒
我知道你难过，但是你要自己

translation.en: YOU LITTLE, HAIRY, LITTER-LICKING SACK OF...
translation.zh: 你这个只会舔垃圾的毛球

translation.en: WHAT? IS IT ON? IS IT ON?
translation.zh: 什么？这个开着吗？

translation.en: [CLEARS THROAT] THIS IS FAIRY GODMOTHER.
translation.zh: 我是神仙娘娘

translation.en: I'M EITHER AWAY FROM MY DESK OR WITH A CLIENT.
translation.zh: 要么不在要么有客户

translation.en: BUT IF YOU COME BY THE OFFICE, WE'LL BE GLAD TO MAKE YOU AN APPOINTMENT.
translation.zh:
你想来我办公室
很高兴与您预约时间

translation.en: HAVE A "HAPPY EVER AFTER."
translation.zh: 祝您永远幸福

translation.en: ARE YOU UP FOR A LITTLE QUEST, DONKEY?
translation.zh:
你准备征战了吗？ 这还差不多
帅克和驴子的另一场探险

translation.en: THAT'S MORE LIKE IT! SHREK AND DONKEY, ON ANOTHER WHIRLWIND ADVENTURE!
translation.zh:
这还差不多
帅克和驴子的另一场探险

translation.en: ♪AIN'T NO STOPPIN' US NOW! WHOA! WE'RE ON THE MOVE! ♪
translation.zh:
谁也不能阻止我们
我们开始行动了

translation.en: STOP, OGRE! I HAVE MISJUDGED YOU.
translation.zh:
够了，老怪！我错怪了你
一起来，我们有外套

translation.en: JOIN THE CLUB. WE'VE GOT JACKETS.
translation.zh:
够了，老怪！我错怪了你
一起来，我们有外套 不胜荣幸
我很高兴陪伴你，直至拯救你生命

translation.en: ON MY HONOR, I AM OBLIGED TO ACCOMPANY YOU UNTIL I HAVE SAVED YOUR LIFE
translation.zh:
不胜荣幸
我很高兴陪伴你，直至拯救你生命

translation.en: AS YOU HAVE SPARED ME MINE.
translation.zh: 因为你放过我一次

translation.en: THE POSITION OF ANNOYING TALKING ANIMAL HAS ALREADY BEEN TAKEN.
translation.zh:
抱歉
多嘴多舌的动物位置已经被占领了

translation.en: LET'S GO, SHREK. SHREK?
translation.zh: 我们走，帅克！

translation.en: AW, COME ON, DONKEY. LOOK AT HIM... IN HIS WEE LITTLE BOOTS.
translation.zh: 来吧，驴子，你看他 穿着小靴子

translation.en: YOU KNOW, HOW MANY CATS CAN WEAR BOOTS? HONESTLY.
translation.zh:
几个猫会穿这种小靴子？ 真的？我们要留下他
你说什么？

translation.en: - LET'S KEEP HIM! - SAY WHAT?
translation.zh:
真的？我们要留下他
你说什么？

translation.en: AHH! LISTEN. HE'S PURRING!
translation.zh: 听着，他在戏哩呼噜

translation.en: - OH, SO NOW IT'S CUTE. - COME ON, DONKEY. LIGHTEN UP.
translation.zh:
蛮可爱的
算了，驴子，轻松点

translation.en: LIGHTEN UP? I SHOULD LIGHTEN UP? LOOK WHO'S TELLING WHO TO LIGHTEN UP!
translation.zh:
轻松？我应该轻松
看看是谁在要我放轻松

translation.en: THEY'RE BOTH FESTIVE, AREN'T THEY?
translation.zh: 两个都有佳节气氛

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU THINK, HAROLD?
translation.zh: 你说呢，哈罗德？

translation.en: UM... YES, YES. FINE. FINE.
translation.zh: 都好

translation.en: TRY TO AT LEAST PRETEND YOU'RE INTERESTED IN YOUR DAUGHTER'S WEDDING BALL.
translation.zh:
哪怕假装对女儿的
婚礼舞会感兴趣也好

translation.en: HONESTLY, LILLIAN, I DON'T THINK IT MATTERS.
translation.zh:
老实说，丽莲
我并不觉得有什么意义

translation.en: HOW DO WE KNOW THERE WILL EVEN BE A BALL?
translation.zh: 怎么会知道要开舞会呢？

translation.en: MOM. DAD.
translation.zh: 妈妈，爸爸

translation.en: OH, HELLO, DEAR.
translation.zh:
你好，亲爱的
你说什么？西德里克？

translation.en: WHAT'S THAT, CEDRIC? RIGHT! COMING.
translation.zh:
你好，亲爱的
你说什么？西德里克？ 对，来了
妈妈，你看到帅克没有？

translation.en: MOM, HAVE YOU SEEN SHREK?
translation.zh:
对，来了
妈妈，你看到帅克没有？

translation.en: I HAVEN'T. YOU SHOULD ASK YOUR FATHER.
translation.zh: 没有，你应该去问你爸爸

translation.en: BE SURE AND USE SMALL WORDS, DEAR. HE'S A LITTLE SLOW THIS MORNING.
translation.zh: 用词尽量简单，他今早有点迟钝

translation.en: - CAN I HELP YOU, YOUR MAJESTY? - AH, YES! UM...
translation.zh:
需要帮忙吗，陛下？
不错

translation.en: MMM! EXQUISITE. WHAT DO YOU CALL THIS DISH?
translation.zh: 精美细致，这道菜叫什么？

translation.en: THAT WOULD BE THE DOG'S BREAKFAST, YOUR MAJESTY.
translation.zh: 那是狗儿的早餐，陛下

translation.en: AH, YES. VERY GOOD, THEN. CARRY ON, CEDRIC.
translation.zh: 非常好，继续，西德里克

translation.en: - DAD? DAD, HAVE YOU SEEN SHREK? - NO, I HAVEN'T, DEAR.
translation.zh:
爸爸，你见到帅克了吗？
没有，他肯定跑出去找个

translation.en: I'M SURE HE JUST WENT OFF TO LOOK FOR A NICE... MUD HOLE TO COOL DOWN IN.
translation.zh: 泥洞钻进去冷静头脑

translation.en: YOU KNOW, AFTER YOUR LITTLE SPAT LAST NIGHT.
translation.zh: 你们昨晚吵过嘴

translation.en: OH. YOU HEARD THAT, HUH?
translation.zh: 你听到了？

translation.en: THE WHOLE KINGDOM HEARD YOU.
translation.zh: 乖女儿，整个王国都听见了

translation.en: I MEAN, AFTER ALL IT IS IN HIS NATURE TO BE,
translation.zh: 其实，这就是他的本性

translation.en: WELL, A BIT OF A BRUTE.
translation.zh: 是有点兽性

translation.en: HIM? YOU KNOW, YOU DIDN'T EXACTLY ROLL OUT THE WELCOME WAGON.
translation.zh: 他？ 你也没有铺红地毯来迎接他

translation.en: WELL, WHAT DID YOU EXPECT? LOOK AT WHAT HE'S DONE TO YOU.
translation.zh:
你还要怎样？
看他把你弄成什么样子了？

translation.en: SHREK LOVES ME FOR WHO I AM.
translation.zh: 帅克爱我

translation.en: I WOULD THINK YOU'D BE HAPPY FOR ME.
translation.zh: 我以为你会为我高兴

translation.en: DARLING, I'M JUST THINKING ABOUT WHAT'S BEST FOR YOU.
translation.zh: 亲爱的，我不过在想什么对你最好

translation.en: MAYBE YOU SHOULD DO THE SAME.
translation.zh: 也许你也应该想想

translation.en: NO, REALLY?
translation.zh: 不，真的？

translation.en: OH, NO. THAT'S THE OLD KEEBLER'S PLACE. LET'S BACK AWAY SLOWLY.
translation.zh:
不！那是精灵的小屋子
赶快悄悄走开

translation.en: THAT'S THE FAIRY GODMOTHER'S COTTAGE.
translation.zh: 那是神仙娘娘的屋子

translation.en: SHE'S THE LARGEST PRODUCER OF HEXES AND POTIONS IN THE WHOLE KINGDOM.
translation.zh:
她是本王国
最大的魔法和毒液制造商

translation.en: THEN WHY DON'T WE POP IN THERE FOR A SPELL? HA-HA! SPELL!
translation.zh: 我们不如进去拜访她

translation.en: [PUSS IN BOOTS] HE MAKES ME LAUGH.
translation.zh: 真会惹人笑

translation.en: HI. I'M HERE TO SEE THE...
translation.zh: 你好，我是来见

translation.en: THE FAIRY GODMOTHER. I'M SORRY. SHE IS NOT IN.
translation.zh:
神仙娘娘
抱歉，她不在

translation.en: [WOMAN] JEROME! COFFEE AND A MONTE CRISTO. NOW!
translation.zh: 杰罗姆，马上给我送咖啡和三文治

translation.en: YES, FAIRY GODMOTHER. RIGHT AWAY.
translation.zh: 是，神仙娘娘，马上就来

translation.en: LOOK, SHE'S NOT SEEING ANY CLIENTS TODAY, OK?
translation.zh: 她今天不见任何客户

translation.en: - IT'S OK. WE'RE FROM THE UNION. - THE UNION?
translation.zh: 没关系，我们是工会来的 工会？

translation.en: WE REPRESENT THE WORKERS IN ALL MAGICAL INDUSTRIES, BOTH EVIL AND BENIGN.
translation.zh:
我们代表所有神奇工业的工人
邪恶和仁慈

translation.en: OH! OH, RIGHT.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: ARE YOU FEELING AT ALL DEGRADED OR OPPRESSED?
translation.zh: 你有受到剥削的感觉吗？

translation.en: UH... A LITTLE. WE DON'T EVEN HAVE DENTAL.
translation.zh: 有一点 我们都没有牙医福利

translation.en: THEY DON'T EVEN HAVE DENTAL.
translation.zh: 他们没有牙医福利

translation.en: OK. WE'LL JUST HAVE A LOOK AROUND.
translation.zh: 我们先看看再说

translation.en: OH. BY THE WAY. I THINK IT'D BE BETTER IF THE FAIRY GODMOTHER DIDN'T KNOW WE WERE HERE.
translation.zh: 对了 最好是神仙娘娘

translation.en: - KNOW WHAT I'M SAYING? HUH? - HUH? HUH? HUH?
translation.zh: 不知道我们在此 明白吗？

translation.en: - STOP IT. - OF COURSE. GO RIGHT IN.
translation.zh:
-停下！
-当然 马上进去

translation.en: [FAIRY GODMOTHER] A DROP OF DESIRE.
translation.zh: 一滴欲望

translation.en: [GIGGLES] NAUGHTY!
translation.zh: 淘气

translation.en: A PINCH OF PASSION.
translation.zh: 一撮热情

translation.en: AND JUST A HINT OF...
translation.zh: 还有一点点

translation.en: LUST!
translation.zh: 淫欲

translation.en: EXCUSE ME.
translation.zh: 打扰一下 抱歉这么粗鲁闯进来

translation.en: SORRY TO BARGE IN LIKE THIS...
translation.zh: 打扰一下 抱歉这么粗鲁闯进来 你们到底想搞什么名堂？

translation.en: WHAT IN GRIMM'S NAME ARE YOU DOING HERE?
translation.zh: 你们到底想搞什么名堂？

translation.en: WELL, IT SEEMS THAT FIONA'S NOT EXACTLY HAPPY.
translation.zh: 其实 菲欧娜好像并不那么开心

translation.en: AND THERE'S SOME QUESTION AS TO WHY THAT IS?
translation.zh: 有些问题是需要澄清的

translation.en: WELL, LET'S EXPLORE THAT, SHALL WE?
translation.zh: 那么我们一起来找出原因吧

translation.en: AH. P-P-P. PRINCESS. CINDERELLA.
translation.zh: 公主…灰姑娘

translation.en: HERE WE ARE. "LIVED HAPPILY EVER AFTER." OH...
translation.zh: 找到了 “快乐幸福地生活”

translation.en: [LAUGHS] NO OGRES!
translation.zh: 没有大老怪

translation.en: LET'S SEE. SNOW WHITE.
translation.zh: 白雪公主

translation.en: A HANDSOME PRINCE. OH, NO OGRES.
translation.zh: 有一位英俊王子 没有大老怪

translation.en: SLEEPING BEAUTY. OH, NO OGRES!
translation.zh: 睡美人 也没有大老怪

translation.en: HANSEL AND GRETEL? NO! THUMBELINA? NO.
translation.zh:
亨瑟与葛莉？没有！
拇指姑娘？没有

translation.en: THE GOLDEN BIRD, THE LITTLE MERMAID, PRETTY WOMAN...
translation.zh: 金鸟、美人鱼、红粉佳人

translation.en: NO, NO, NO, NO, NO!
translation.zh: 全都没有

translation.en: YOU SEE, OGRES DON'T LIVE HAPPILY EVER AFTER.
translation.zh: 大老怪没有幸福生活的故事

translation.en: ALL RIGHT, LOOK, LADY!
translation.zh: 好吧 夫人

translation.en: DON'T YOU POINT... THOSE DIRTY GREEN SAUSAGES AT ME!
translation.zh:
不许你
拿着肮脏爪子指我！

translation.en: YOUR MONTE CRISTO AND COFFEE.
translation.zh: 您的三文治和咖啡

translation.en: OH! SORRY.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: AH... THAT'S OK. WE WERE JUST LEAVING.
translation.zh: 没事，反正我们要走了

translation.en: VERY SORRY TO HAVE WASTED YOUR TIME, MISS GODMOTHER.
translation.zh: 抱歉浪费了您的时间，娘娘小姐

translation.en: JUST... GO.
translation.zh: 赶快走！

translation.en: COME ON, GUYS.
translation.zh: 来吧！

translation.en: TGIF, EH, BUDDY?
translation.zh: 还好今天是星期五，对吧？

translation.en: WORKING HARD OR HARDLY WORKING, EH, MAC?
translation.zh: 努力工作要么就不工作

translation.en: GET YOUR FINE CORINTHIAN FOOTWEAR AND YOUR CAT CHEEKS OUT OF MY FACE! MAN, THAT STINKS!
translation.zh:
穿上你的高级皮靴子
别拿你的臭脸在我脸上擦来擦去

translation.en: YOU DON'T EXACTLY SMELL LIKE A BASKET OF ROSES.
translation.zh: 你也不是像鲜花一样香

translation.en: WELL, ONE OF THESE HAS GOT TO HELP. I WAS JUST CONCOCTING THIS VERY PLAN!
translation.zh:
总得有人帮忙
我只是在协调这个计划

translation.en: ALREADY OUR MINDS ARE BECOMING ONE.
translation.zh: 我们已经两脑合一了

translation.en: WHOA. IF WE NEED AN EXPERT ON LICKING OURSELVES,
translation.zh:
哇哇哇！ 需要找人舔身子
我们会给你打电话

translation.en: WE'LL GIVE YOU A CALL.
translation.zh:
需要找人舔身子
我们会给你打电话

translation.en: SHREK, THIS IS A BAD IDEA.
translation.zh: 帅克 这是个坏主意

translation.en: LOOK. MAKE YOURSELF USEFUL AND GO KEEP WATCH.
translation.zh: 别当废物 做点有用的事

translation.en: PUSS, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD GET TO THOSE ON TOP?
translation.zh: 猫咪 你能够着上面的东西吗？

translation.en: NO PROBLEMA, BOSS. IN ONE OF MY NINE LIVES,
translation.zh:
没问题 老板 在我今生九条命里
我是西班牙最厉害的猫盗匪

translation.en: I WAS THE GREAT CAT BURGLAR OF SANTIAGO DE COMPOSTELA.
translation.zh:
在我今生九条命里
我是西班牙最厉害的猫盗匪

translation.en: SHREK, ARE YOU OFF YOUR NUT?
translation.zh: 帅克 你疯了？

translation.en: DONKEY, KEEP WATCH.
translation.zh: 驴子 继续放哨

translation.en: KEEP WATCH? YEAH, I'LL KEEP WATCH.
translation.zh: 放哨？我会放哨

translation.en: I'LL WATCH THAT WICKED WITCH COME AND WHAMMY A WORLD OF HURT UP YOUR BACKSIDE.
translation.zh:
我会看着邪恶的巫婆下来
说不定打痛你的屁股

translation.en: I'LL LAUGH, TOO. I'LL BE GIGGLING TO MYSELF.
translation.zh: 我也会笑

translation.en: - WHAT DO YOU SEE? - TOAD STOOL SOFTENER?
translation.zh:
-你能看见什么？
-蟾蜍粪便软化剂

translation.en: I'M SURE A NICE BM IS THE PERFECT SOLUTION FOR MARITAL PROBLEMS.
translation.zh:
你说得对 痛快大解一次
肯定是解决婚姻问题的最佳方案

translation.en: - ELFA SELTZER? - UH-UH.
translation.zh: 抗酸剂？

translation.en: - HEX LAX? - NO! TRY "HANDSOME."
translation.zh:
-通便剂？
-不！试试“英俊”

translation.en: SORRY. NO HANDSOME.
translation.zh: 抱歉 没有“英俊”

translation.en: HEY! HOW ABOUT "HAPPILY EVER AFTER"?
translation.zh: “从此幸福”如何？

translation.en: WELL, WHAT DOES IT DO?
translation.zh: 有什么功效？

translation.en: IT SAYS "BEAUTY DIVINE."
translation.zh: 说是美容圣品

translation.en: IN SOME CULTURES, DONKEYS ARE REVERED AS THE WISEST OF CREATURES.
translation.zh:
在有些文化中
驴子是最聪明的动物

translation.en: ESPECIALLY US TALKING ONES.
translation.zh: 尤其是我们会讲话的

translation.en: THAT'LL HAVE TO DO. WE'VE GOT COMPANY.
translation.zh: 够了，有人来了

translation.en: CAN WE GET ON WITH THIS?
translation.zh: 我们可以继续吗？

translation.en: HURRY!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: NICE CATCH, DONKEY!
translation.zh: 好样的，驴子！

translation.en: FINALLY! A GOOD USE FOR YOUR MOUTH.
translation.zh: 总算用到你的嘴巴！

translation.en: COME ON!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: I DON'T CARE WHOSE FAULT IT IS. JUST GET THIS PLACE CLEANED UP!
translation.zh:
我不管是谁的错
快把这里清理干净 是，神仙娘娘
来人

translation.en: AND SOMEBODY BRING ME SOMETHING DEEP FRIED AND SMOTHERED IN CHOCOLATE!
translation.zh:
给我拿些油炸食物
上面裹着巧克力！

translation.en: - MOTHER! - CHARMING. SWEETHEART.
translation.zh:
母亲！
小白，乖儿子

translation.en: THIS ISN'T A GOOD TIME, PUMPKIN. MAMA'S WORKING.
translation.zh: 现在不行，妈妈要工作

translation.en: WHOA, WHAT HAPPENED HERE?
translation.zh: 哇，这里出了什么事？

translation.en: THE OGRE, THAT'S WHAT!
translation.zh: 大老怪来过

translation.en: WHAT? WHERE IS HE, MOM?
translation.zh: 什么？他在哪里？

translation.en: I SHALL REND HIS HEAD FROM HIS SHOULDERS!
translation.zh: 我要把他的头拧下来！

translation.en: I WILL SMITE HIM WHERE HE STANDS!
translation.zh: 当场把他砸扁！

translation.en: HE WILL RUE THE VERY DAY HE STOLE MY KINGDOM FROM ME!
translation.zh: 让他为夺去了我的王国而后悔

translation.en: OH, PUT IT AWAY, JUNIOR! YOU'RE STILL GOING TO BE KING.
translation.zh: 收回你的剑，孩子，你还能当上王

translation.en: WE'LL JUST HAVE TO COME UP WITH SOMETHING SMARTER.
translation.zh: 我们只需要想出更聪明的主意

translation.en: PARDON. UM...
translation.zh: 对不起，一切都算清楚了，娘娘

translation.en: EVERYTHING IS ACCOUNTED FOR, FAIRY GODMOTHER, EXCEPT FOR ONE POTION.
translation.zh:
对不起，一切都算清楚了，娘娘 除了一样
什么？

translation.en: WHAT?
translation.zh:
除了一样
什么？

translation.en: I DO BELIEVE WE CAN MAKE THIS WORK TO OUR ADVANTAGE.
translation.zh: 我看这对我们有利

translation.en: "HAPPILY EVER AFTER POTION. MAXIMUM STRENGTH.
translation.zh: “从此幸福”汁液最大的能力

translation.en: "FOR YOU AND YOUR TRUE LOVE.
translation.zh: 对你和你真心爱的人

translation.en: "IF ONE OF YOU DRINKS THIS, YOU BOTH WILL BE FINE.
translation.zh: 如果一人喝下，两人都会没事

translation.en: "HAPPINESS, COMFORT AND BEAUTY DIVINE."
translation.zh: 幸福，舒适并美丽动人

translation.en: - YOU BOTH WILL BE FINE? - I GUESS IT'LL AFFECT FIONA.
translation.zh:
你们两人都会没事
恐怕，这也会影响到菲欧娜

translation.en: MAN, THIS DON'T FEEL RIGHT. MY DONKEY SENSES ARE TINGLING ALL OVER.
translation.zh:
感觉好像不对
我感觉有点怪怪的 赶快丢掉那瓶鬼东西跑出去

translation.en: DROP THAT JUG O' VOODOO AND LET'S GET OUT OF HERE.
translation.zh: 赶快丢掉那瓶鬼东西跑出去

translation.en: IT SAYS, "BEAUTY DIVINE." HOW BAD CAN IT BE?
translation.zh:
上面写着“美容圣品”
能差到哪里去？

translation.en: SEE, YOU'RE ALLERGIC TO THAT STUFF.
translation.zh:
你对那种东西过敏
你会产生反应

translation.en: YOU'LL HAVE A REACTION.
translation.zh:
你对那种东西过敏
你会产生反应 如果你觉得
我会给你擦上感冒涂膏，好好想！

translation.en: AND IF YOU THINK I'LL SMEAR VAPOR RUB OVER YOUR CHEST, THINK AGAIN!
translation.zh:
如果你觉得
我会给你擦上感冒涂膏，好好想！

translation.en: BOSS, JUST IN CASE THERE IS SOMETHING WRONG WITH THE POTION...
translation.zh: 老板，万一那个东西有问题

translation.en: ALLOW ME TO TAKE THE FIRST SIP.
translation.zh: 让我先尝尝

translation.en: IT WOULD BE AN HONOR TO LAY MY LIFE ON THE LINE FOR YOU.
translation.zh: 我甘愿为你抛洒热血

translation.en: OH, NO, NO. I DON'T THINK SO. IF THERE'LL BE ANY ANIMAL TESTING, I'LL DO IT.
translation.zh:
不，我看不行
如果要做动物试验，就让我来

translation.en: THAT'S THE BEST FRIEND'S JOB. NOW GIVE ME THAT BOTTLE.
translation.zh: 这是好朋友的事，给我瓶子

translation.en: HOW DO YOU FEEL?
translation.zh: 你觉得如何？

translation.en: I DON'T FEEL ANY DIFFERENT. I LOOK ANY DIFFERENT?
translation.zh: 没什么异样，我有变化吗？

translation.en: YOU STILL LOOK LIKE AN ASS TO ME.
translation.zh: 没什么异样，我有变化吗？ 我看你还是像个驴子

translation.en: MAYBE IT DOESN'T WORK ON DONKEYS.
translation.zh: 也许对驴子没有作用

translation.en: - WELL, HERE'S TO US, FIONA. - SHREK?
translation.zh: 为我们干杯，菲欧娜

translation.en: YOU DRINK THAT, THERE'S NO GOING BACK. I KNOW.
translation.zh:
一喝下去就没有退路了
我知道

translation.en: - NO MORE WALLOWING IN THE MUD? - I KNOW.
translation.zh:
不在泥潭里打滚了？
我知道

translation.en: - NO MORE ITCHY BUTT CRACK? - I KNOW!
translation.zh:
后面也不会痒了
我知道！

translation.en: - BUT YOU LOVE BEING AN OGRE! - I KNOW!
translation.zh:
但你喜欢当老怪！
我知道

translation.en: BUT I LOVE FIONA MORE.
translation.zh: 但我更爱菲欧娜

translation.en: SHREK, NO! WAIT!
translation.zh: 帅克，等等！

translation.en: GOT TO BE... I THINK YOU GRABBED THE "FARTY EVER AFTER" POTION.
translation.zh:
一定是
你肯定是拿了“从此放屁”汁液

translation.en: MAYBE IT'S A DUD.
translation.zh: 也许失败了

translation.en: OR MAYBE FIONA AND I WERE NEVER MEANT TO BE.
translation.zh: 也许菲欧娜和我根本就无缘

translation.en: UH-OH. WHAT DID I TELL YOU? I FEEL SOMETHING COMING ON.
translation.zh:
我不是对你说过吗？
我觉得好像要出事了

translation.en: I DON'T WANT TO DIE. I DON'T WANT TO DIE.
translation.zh: 帅克，我不想死！

translation.en: OH, SWEET SISTER, MOTHER OF MERCY. I'M MELTING!
translation.zh: 我的妈妈呀！我在熔化！

translation.en: I'M MELTING!
translation.zh: 我在熔化！

translation.en: IT'S JUST THE RAIN, DONKEY.
translation.zh: 下雨而已

translation.en: DON'T WORRY. THINGS SEEM BAD BECAUSE IT'S DARK AND RAINY
translation.zh:
别担心，事情不顺
是因为现在太黑且下雨

translation.en: AND FIONA'S FATHER HIRED A SLEAZY HITMAN TO WHACK YOU.
translation.zh:
而且菲欧娜的父亲
雇了杀手来对付你

translation.en: IT'LL BE BETTER IN THE MORNING. YOU'LL SEE... ♪THE SUN'LL COME OUT ♪
translation.zh: 早上一切都会好起来 太阳会出来

translation.en: ♪TOMORROW ♪
translation.zh: 明天

translation.en: ♪BET YOUR BOTTOM... ♪
translation.zh: 以你的屁股担保

translation.en: BET MY BOTTOM?
translation.zh: 以我的屁股担保？

translation.en: I'M COMING, ELIZABETH!
translation.zh: 我要来了 伊丽莎白！

translation.en: ARE YOU ALL RIGHT?
translation.zh: 驴子 你没事吧？

translation.en: - HEY, BOSS. LET'S SHAVE HIM. - D-DONKEY?
translation.zh: 老板 我们给他剃毛

translation.en: THERE YOU ARE! WE MISSED YOU AT DINNER.
translation.zh: 你来了！我们晚餐时没见你

translation.en: WHAT IS IT, DARLING?
translation.zh: 怎么了 亲爱的？

translation.en: DAD... I'VE BEEN THINKING ABOUT WHAT YOU SAID.
translation.zh: 爸爸 我在想你说过的话

translation.en: AND I'M GOING TO SET THINGS RIGHT.
translation.zh: 我要把一切都整理清楚

translation.en: AH! EXCELLENT! THAT'S MY GIRL.
translation.zh: 好极了 这才是我的乖女儿

translation.en: IT WAS A MISTAKE TO BRING SHREK HERE.
translation.zh: 带帅克来这里是个错误

translation.en: I'M GOING TO GO OUT AND FIND HIM.
translation.zh: 我去找他

translation.en: AND THEN WE'LL GO BACK TO THE SWAMP WHERE WE BELONG.
translation.zh: 然后我们就一起回到沼泽地里

translation.en: FIONA, PLEASE!
translation.zh:
菲欧娜，求你！ 不要卤莽
你现在哪里也不能去

translation.en: LET'S NOT BE RASH, DARLING. YOU CAN'T GO ANYWHERE RIGHT NOW.
translation.zh:
不要卤莽
你现在哪里也不能去

translation.en: LOOK, I TOLD YOU HE WAS HERE. LOOK AT HIM! QUIET. LOOK AT HIM.
translation.zh:
我说过他在这里，看看他！
安静，别吵醒他！

translation.en: GOOD MORNING, SLEEPYHEAD.
translation.zh:
早上好，瞌睡虫！
早上好！

translation.en: WE LOVE YOUR KITTY!
translation.zh: 我们喜欢你的小猫！

translation.en: [SHREK] OH... MY HEAD... HERE, I FETCHED A PAIL OF WATER.
translation.zh:
我的头
我打了一桶水

translation.en: THANKS.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: A CUTE BUTTON NOSE?
translation.zh: 可爱的小圆鼻子

translation.en: THICK, WAVY LOCKS?
translation.zh: 蜷曲的头发？

translation.en: TAUT, ROUND BUTTOCKS?
translation.zh: 浑圆的屁股？
我…

translation.en: - GORGEOUS! - I'LL SAY.
translation.zh:
-太帅了
-我说是…

translation.en: I'M JILL. WHAT'S YOUR NAME?
translation.zh: 我是吉尔 你叫什么？

translation.en: - UM... SHREK. - SHREK? ARE YOU FROM EUROPE?
translation.zh:
-帅克
-帅克？你是欧洲人吗？

translation.en: - YOU'RE TENSE. - I WANT TO RUB HIS SHOULDERS.
translation.zh:
-你好紧张
-我想为他按摩肩膀

translation.en: - I GOT IT COVERED. - I DON'T HAVE ANYTHING TO RUB.
translation.zh:
-我来吧
-谢谢 我没有什么好按摩

translation.en: GET IN LINE.
translation.zh: 好吧 排队吧 你们看见我的驴子吗？

translation.en: - HAVE YOU SEEN MY DONKEY? - WHO ARE YOU CALLING DONKEY?
translation.zh: 你们看见我的驴子吗？ 你们叫谁“驴子”？

translation.en: - DONKEY? YOU'RE A... - A STALLION, BABY!
translation.zh:
-驴子？你是…
-种马 宝贝

translation.en: I CAN WHINNY. I CAN COUNT.
translation.zh: 我会嘶叫 会数数

translation.en: LOOK AT ME, SHREK! I'M TROTTING!
translation.zh: 看看我 我还会踢前后蹄

translation.en: THAT'S SOME QUALITY POTION. WHAT'S IN THAT STUFF?
translation.zh: 真是琼浆玉液 里面有什么？

translation.en: "OH, DON'T TAKE THE POTION, MR. BOSS, IT'S VERY BAD."
translation.zh: 别喝下汁液 老板 那不好

translation.en: "WARNING: SIDE EFFECTS MAY INCLUDE BURNING, ITCHING, OOZING, WEEPING.
translation.zh:
警告 副作用包括
燃烧、瘙痒、腹泻、哭泣

translation.en: "NOT INTENDED FOR HEART PATIENTS OR THOSE WITH... NERVOUS DISORDERS."
translation.zh:
不适用于有心脏病者或
神经紊乱者

translation.en: I'M TROTTING, I'M TROTTING IN PLACE! YEAH!
translation.zh: 我可以原地踢前后蹄

translation.en: WHAT?
translation.zh:
-什么？
-先生

translation.en: SEÑOR? "TO MAKE THE EFFECTS OF THIS POTION PERMANENT,
translation.zh: 如果要能使汁液效果持续

translation.en: "THE DRINKER MUST OBTAIN HIS TRUE LOVE'S KISS BY MIDNIGHT."
translation.zh:
喝者必须在子夜前
得到真正爱人的亲吻

translation.en: MIDNIGHT? WHY IS IT ALWAYS MIDNIGHT?
translation.zh: 子夜？为何总是子夜？

translation.en: - ME! I'LL BE YOUR TRUE LOVE! - I'LL BE YOUR TRUE LOVE.
translation.zh:
-选我吧 我当你真爱！
-我来做你真爱

translation.en: I'LL BE TRUE... ENOUGH.
translation.zh: 我要做你的真爱！

translation.en: LOOK, LADIES, I ALREADY HAVE A TRUE LOVE.
translation.zh: 我要做你的真爱！ 小姐们 我已有了真爱

translation.en: AND TAKE IT FROM ME, BOSS. YOU ARE GOING TO HAVE ONE SATISFIED PRINCESS.
translation.zh:
请记住我的话
你会有一位满意的公主

translation.en: [DONKEY] AND LET'S FACE IT. YOU'RE A LOT EASIER ON THE EYES.
translation.zh: 说真的 你现在顺眼多了

translation.en: INSIDE YOU'RE THE SAME OLD MEAN, SALTY...
translation.zh: 但你的内心 还是那个老怪

translation.en: - EASY. - ...CANTANKEROUS, FOUL,
translation.zh:
-小心点
-一点没有高雅情绪

translation.en: ANGRY OGRE YOU ALWAYS BEEN.
translation.zh: 永远愤怒的大老怪

translation.en: AND YOU'RE STILL THE SAME ANNOYING DONKEY.
translation.zh: 而你也还是那个令人讨厌的驴子

translation.en: - YEAH. - [SIGHS]
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: LOOK OUT, PRINCESS. HERE COMES THE NEW ME.
translation.zh:
看好了，公主
崭新的我来了

translation.en: FIRST THINGS FIRST. WE NEED TO GET YOU OUT OF THOSE CLOTHES.
translation.zh: 首先，你要换身衣服

translation.en: - READY? - READY!
translation.zh:
准备好了？
好了

translation.en: - AAAAHHH! - DRIVER, STOP!
translation.zh: 司机，停车！

translation.en: [DONKEY] OH, GOD! HELP ME, PLEASE! MY RACING DAYS ARE OVER!
translation.zh:
天哪！快帮我
我开快车的日子结束了！

translation.en: I'M BLIND! I'M BLIND! TELL THE TRUTH. WILL I EVER PLAY THE VIOLIN AGAIN?
translation.zh:
我是瞎子，说实话
我还能拉小提琴吗？

translation.en: YOU POOR CREATURE! IS THERE ANYTHING I CAN DO FOR YOU?
translation.zh: 小可怜，我能帮你吗？

translation.en: WELL, I GUESS THERE IS ONE THING.
translation.zh: 有一件事

translation.en: TAKE OFF THE POWDERED WIG AND STEP AWAY FROM YOUR DRAWERS.
translation.zh: 脱下假发，丢掉裤子！

translation.en: - NOT BAD. - NOT BAD AT ALL.
translation.zh:
不错嘛！
一点不错

translation.en: FATHER? IS EVERYTHING ALL RIGHT, FATHER?
translation.zh: 父亲，一切都还好么？

translation.en: THANK YOU, GENTLEMEN! SOMEDAY, I WILL REPAY YOU.
translation.zh: 谢谢，先生，我会偿还的

translation.en: UNLESS, OF COURSE, I CAN'T FIND YOU OR IF I FORGET.
translation.zh: 除非我找不到你，或是忘了你

translation.en: - [WHINNIES, BUCKS] - [ANGRY SPANISH]
translation.zh:
你这个带腿的肉蛋
看你怎么过关？

translation.en: HALT! TELL PRINCESS FIONA HER HUSBAND, SIR SHREK, IS HERE TO SEE HER.
translation.zh: 通报公主他的丈夫前来进见

translation.en: HELLO, HANDSOME.
translation.zh: 你好，帅哥

translation.en: - PRINCESS! - DONKEY?
translation.zh:
公主？
驴子？

translation.en: WOW! THAT POTION WORKED ON YOU, TOO?
translation.zh: 哇！那个汁液对你也有作用？ 什么汁液？

translation.en: WHAT POTION?
translation.zh: 什么汁液？

translation.en: SHREK AND I TOOK SOME MAGIC POTION, AND WELL...
translation.zh:
说来话长，但是
帅克和我弄到一种神奇汁液 现在我们就变成性感美人了

translation.en: NOW, WE'RE SEXY!
translation.zh: 现在我们就变成性感美人了

translation.en: FOR YOU, BABY... I COULD BE.
translation.zh: 为了你，我愿意

translation.en: - YEAH, YOU WISH. - DONKEY, WHERE IS SHREK?
translation.zh:
想得美
驴子，帅克在哪里？

translation.en: HE WENT INSIDE LOOKING FOR YOU.
translation.zh: 他进去找你了

translation.en: YOU WANT TO DANCE, PRETTY BOY?
translation.zh: 想跳舞吗，帅哥？

translation.en: ARE YOU GOING SO SOON? DON'T YOU WANT TO SEE YOUR WIFE?
translation.zh:
这么快就走？
不想见见你太太吗？

translation.en: AYE, FIONA. IT IS ME.
translation.zh: 菲欧娜，是我

translation.en: WHAT HAPPENED TO YOUR VOICE?
translation.zh: 你的声音怎么了？

translation.en: THE POTION CHANGED A LOT OF THINGS, FIONA.
translation.zh: 汁液改变了很多东西

translation.en: BUT NOT THE WAY I FEEL ABOUT YOU.
translation.zh: 但不变的是我对你的心

translation.en: FIONA?
translation.zh: 菲欧娜

translation.en: CHARMING?
translation.zh: 小白？

translation.en: DO YOU THINK SO? [LAUGHS] DAD? I WAS SO HOPING YOU'D APPROVE.
translation.zh: 你喜欢吗，爸爸？

translation.en: - UM... WHO ARE YOU? - MOM, IT'S ME, SHREK.
translation.zh:
我以为你会同意呢 你是谁？
妈妈，是我，帅克

translation.en: I KNOW YOU NEVER GET A SECOND CHANCE AT A FIRST IMPRESSION
translation.zh:
我知道人的第一印象
永远都是最重要的

translation.en: BUT, WELL, WHAT DO YOU THINK?
translation.zh: 你觉得如何？

translation.en: OH, SHOOT! I DON'T THINK THEY CAN HEAR US, PIGEON.
translation.zh: 走开！他们听不到我们的

translation.en: DON'T YOU THINK YOU'VE ALREADY MESSED HER LIFE UP ENOUGH?
translation.zh:
你不觉得已经
把她的生活搞得够糟了吗？

translation.en: I JUST WANTED HER TO BE HAPPY.
translation.zh: 我只希望她能够幸福

translation.en: AND NOW SHE CAN BE.
translation.zh: 现在可以了

translation.en: OH, SWEETHEART.
translation.zh: 亲爱的

translation.en: SHE'S FINALLY FOUND THE PRINCE OF HER DREAMS.
translation.zh: 她终于找到了梦寐以求的白马王子

translation.en: BUT LOOK AT ME. LOOK WHAT I'VE DONE FOR HER.
translation.zh:
看看我
看我把她搞什么什么样子？

translation.en: IT'S TIME YOU STOP LIVING IN A FAIRY TALE, SHREK.
translation.zh: 你不要生活在童话里了

translation.en: SHE'S A PRINCESS. AND YOU'RE AN OGRE.
translation.zh:
她是公主
你是大老怪

translation.en: THAT'S SOMETHING NO AMOUNT OF POTION WILL EVER CHANGE.
translation.zh: 这是无法改变的事实

translation.en: BUT... I LOVE HER.
translation.zh: 但是 我爱她

translation.en: IF YOU REALLY LOVE HER...
translation.zh: 你如果真的爱她

translation.en: YOU'LL LET HER GO.
translation.zh: 就应该让她走

translation.en: SHREK? SEÑOR?
translation.zh: 帅克？ 先生

translation.en: WHAT'S GOING ON? WHERE ARE YOU GOING?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？你要去哪里？

translation.en: YOU WOULDN'T HAVE HAD ANYTHING TO DO WITH THIS, WOULD YOU, HAROLD?
translation.zh: 这一切跟你无关吧，哈罗德？

translation.en: ♪PEOPLE JUST AIN'T NO GOOD ♪
translation.zh: 人们就是不好

translation.en: ♪I THINK THAT'S WELL UNDERSTOOD ♪
translation.zh: 这个大家都明白

translation.en: THERE YOU GO, BOYS.
translation.zh: 给你们了

translation.en: JUST LEAVE THE BOTTLE, DORIS.
translation.zh: 放下瓶子

translation.en: HEY. WHY THE LONG FACE?
translation.zh: 为何那么难过？

translation.en: IT WAS ALL JUST A STUPID MISTAKE.
translation.zh: 只不过是个愚蠢的错误

translation.en: I NEVER SHOULD'VE RESCUED HER FROM THAT TOWER IN THE FIRST PLACE.
translation.zh: 我本来就不该从塔楼里救出她

translation.en: I HATE MONDAYS.
translation.zh: 我讨厌星期一

translation.en: I CAN'T BELIEVE YOU'RE WALKING AWAY FROM THE BEST THING THAT HAPPENED TO YOU.
translation.zh:
我不相信你竟然要走掉
事情进展那么顺利

translation.en: WHAT CHOICE DO I HAVE?
translation.zh: 我有什么办法？

translation.en: SHE LOVES THAT PRETTY BOY, PRINCE CHARMING.
translation.zh: 她喜欢那位白马王子

translation.en: COME ON. IS HE REALLY THAT GOOD-LOOKING?
translation.zh: 其实 他真有那么英俊吗？

translation.en: ARE YOU KIDDING? HE'S GORGEOUS!
translation.zh: 开什么玩笑 他绝对能迷倒众生

translation.en: HE HAS A FACE THAT LOOKS LIKE IT WAS CARVED BY ANGELS.
translation.zh: 他的脸那么棱角分明

translation.en: OH. HE SOUNDS DREAMY.
translation.zh: 声音如梦如幻

translation.en: SHOCKINGLY, THIS ISN'T MAKING ME FEEL ANY BETTER.
translation.zh: 可惜我一点感觉都没有

translation.en: LOOK, GUYS. IT'S FOR THE BEST.
translation.zh: 这样对大家都好

translation.en: MOM AND DAD APPROVE, AND FIONA GETS THE MAN SHE'S ALWAYS DREAMED OF.
translation.zh:
妈妈爸爸同意了
菲欧娜得到他梦寐以求的人

translation.en: EVERYBODY WINS.
translation.zh: 大家都能赢

translation.en: EXCEPT FOR YOU.
translation.zh: 除了你

translation.en: I DON'T GET IT, SHREK. YOU LOVE FIONA. AYE.
translation.zh:
我不明白 帅克
你不是爱菲欧娜玛？

translation.en: AND THAT'S WHY I HAVE TO LET HER GO.
translation.zh: 所以我要放她走

translation.en: EXCUSE ME, IS SHE HERE?
translation.zh: 对不起，她在这里吗？

translation.en: SHE'S ER... IN THE BACK.
translation.zh: 她在后面

translation.en: OH, HELLO AGAIN.
translation.zh: 你们好

translation.en: FAIRY GODMOTHER. CHARMING.
translation.zh: 神仙娘娘,真是让人高兴

translation.en: OH. YOU'D BETTER HAVE A GOOD REASON FOR DRAGGING US DOWN HERE.
translation.zh:
你最好有原因说明
为何扯大家来这里

translation.en: WELL, I'M AFRAID FIONA ISN'T REALLY... WARMING UP TO PRINCE CHARMING.
translation.zh:
我害怕菲欧娜并不
那么钟情于白马王子

translation.en: - FYI, NOT MY FAULT. - NO, OF COURSE IT'S NOT, DEAR.
translation.zh:
其实，也不能怪我
当然不会

translation.en: I MEAN, HOW CHARMING CAN I BE, WHEN I HAVE TO PRETEND I'M THAT DREADFUL OGRE?
translation.zh:
我还能有多大魅力呢？
当我假装我是那个可怕的妖怪？

translation.en: NO, NO, IT'S NOBODY'S FAULT.
translation.zh: 不！这不是任何人的错

translation.en: PERHAPS IT'S BEST IF WE JUST CALL THE WHOLE THING OFF. OK?
translation.zh: 也许最好不要继续下去了

translation.en: - WHAT? - YOU CAN'T FORCE SOMEONE TO FALL IN LOVE.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-其实 你不能逼迫人家爱上你

translation.en: I BEG TO DIFFER. I DO IT ALL THE TIME!
translation.zh: 我不同意 我一向这样

translation.en: HAVE FIONA DRINK THIS AND SHE'LL FALL IN LOVE WITH THE FIRST MAN SHE KISSES.
translation.zh:
让菲欧娜喝下这个
她就会爱上最先献吻的人

translation.en: WHICH WILL BE CHARMING.
translation.zh:
让菲欧娜喝下这个
她就会爱上最先献吻的人 那就是小白

translation.en: - UM... NO. - WHAT DID YOU SAY?
translation.zh:
-不
-你说什么？

translation.en: I CAN'T. I WON'T DO IT.
translation.zh: 我不能 我不会那样做

translation.en: OH, YES, YOU WILL.
translation.zh: 你会的 如果你记得

translation.en: IF YOU REMEMBER, I HELPED YOU WITH YOUR HAPPILY EVER AFTER.
translation.zh: 我成全了你的今生幸福

translation.en: AND I CAN TAKE IT AWAY JUST AS EASILY.
translation.zh: 我也能轻易地拿走

translation.en: IS THAT WHAT YOU WANT? IS IT?
translation.zh: 你要这样吗？

translation.en: - NO. - GOOD BOY.
translation.zh:
-不
-真乖

translation.en: NOW, WE HAVE TO GO.
translation.zh: 我们要走了

translation.en: I NEED TO DO CHARMING'S HAIR BEFORE THE BALL.
translation.zh: 要在舞会前做好小白的头发

translation.en: HE'S HOPELESS. HE'S ALL HIGH IN THE FRONT.
translation.zh:
他一点办法没有
前面的头发总是翘起来

translation.en: HE CAN NEVER GET TO THE BACK. YOU NEED SOMEONE TO DO THE BACK.
translation.zh:
他一点办法没有
前面的头发总是翘起来 你总需要有人帮你打理后面的头发

translation.en: OH. THANK YOU, MOTHER.
translation.zh: 谢谢 母亲！

translation.en: [DONKEY] MOTHER?
translation.zh: 母亲？

translation.en: UM... MARY! A TALKING HORSE!
translation.zh: 玛丽！会说话的驴子！

translation.en: THE OGRE!
translation.zh: 大老怪

translation.en: STOP THEM! THIEVES! BANDITS! STOP THEM!
translation.zh:
阻止他们！有贼 强盗！
阻止他们！

translation.en: (ANNOUNCER) THE ABS ARE FAB AND IT'S GLUTEUS TO THE MAXIMUS
translation.zh: 浑身上下 肌肉发达

translation.en: HERE TONIGHT AT THE FAR, FAR AWAY ROYAL BALL BLOWOUT!
translation.zh: 在今晚的遥远王国里

translation.en: THE COACHES ARE LINED UP AS THE CREAM OF THE CROP POURS OUT OF THEM
translation.zh: 名人车辆排成行

translation.en: LIKE MISS MUFFET'S CURDS AND WHEY.
translation.zh: 名人车辆排成行 出来的有玛菲小姐

translation.en: EVERYONE WHO'S ANYONE HAS TURNED OUT TO HONOR PRINCESS FIONA AND PRINCE SHREK.
translation.zh:
大家都互相认识 大家都来
祝福菲欧娜公主和帅克王子

translation.en: AND, OH MY, THE OUTFITS LOOK GORGEOUS!
translation.zh: 哦 天 他们的打扮真漂亮！

translation.en: LOOK! HANSEL AND GRETEL!
translation.zh: 看 亨瑟和葛丽也在！

translation.en: [WOMAN] WHAT ARE THE CRUMBS FOR?
translation.zh: 面包渣是怎么回事？

translation.en: AND RIGHT BEHIND THEM, TOM THUMB AND THUMBELINA!
translation.zh: 就在他们身后是汤姆和拇指姑娘

translation.en: OH, AREN'T THEY ADORABLE!
translation.zh: 他们好可爱

translation.en: HERE COMES SLEEPING BEAUTY!
translation.zh: 还有睡美人！

translation.en: TIRED OLD THING.
translation.zh: 真可怜 总是那么累

translation.en: WHO'S THIS? WHO'S THIS? WHO IS THIS?
translation.zh: 这是谁？

translation.en: OH. IT'S THE ONE, IT'S THE ONLY...
translation.zh: 就是她

translation.en: IT'S THE FAIRY GODMOTHER!
translation.zh: 神仙娘娘

translation.en: HELLO, FAR, FAR AWAY!
translation.zh: 大家好 遥远王国！

translation.en: CAN I GET A WHOOP WHOOP?
translation.zh: 大家制造一点气氛吧

translation.en: MAY ALL YOUR ENDINGS BE HAPPY AND...
translation.zh: 希望你们都有幸福的结局

translation.en: WELL, YOU KNOW THE REST!
translation.zh: 你们知道其他的

translation.en: WE'LL BE RIGHT BACK WITH THE ROYAL FAR, FAR AWAY BALL
translation.zh: 等我们回到遥远王国的皇家舞会时

translation.en: AFTER THESE MESSAGES.
translation.zh: 广告过后

translation.en: I HATE THESE BALL SHOWS.
translation.zh: 我讨厌这些明星聚会的场合

translation.en: THEY BORE ME TO TEARS. FLIP OVER TO WHEEL OF TORTURE!
translation.zh:
无聊透了
不如转台看《幸运转轮》

translation.en: I'M NOT FLIPPING ANYWHERE, SIR, UNTIL I SEE SHREK AND FIONA.
translation.zh: 没看见帅克和公主不能转台

translation.en: WHIZZES ON YOU GUYS.
translation.zh: 真讨厌！

translation.en: HEY, MICE, PASS ME A BUFFALO WING!
translation.zh: 老鼠，给我一个炸鸡翅

translation.en: NO, TO YOUR LEFT. YOUR LEFT!
translation.zh: 不 在你们的左边 左边

translation.en: - TONIGHT ON "KNIGHTS"... - NOW HERE'S A GOOD SHOW!
translation.zh:
今晚在“骑士”节目中
这是好节目

translation.en: WE GOT A WHITE BRONCO HEADING EAST INTO THE FOREST. REQUESTING BACKUP.
translation.zh:
一辆白色勃朗科是向东边树林
请求增援

translation.en: IT'S TIME TO TEACH THESE MADCAP MAMMALS
translation.zh: 人民卫士要给这些坏人一个教训

translation.en: THEIR "DEVIL MAY MARE" ATTITUDES JUST WON'T FLY.
translation.zh:
他们的坏习惯不能逃出法网
好了！好了！

translation.en: WHY YOU GRABBING ME? POLICE BRUTALITY!
translation.zh: 你为何要抓我？警察行为野蛮

translation.en: I HAVE TO TALK TO PRINCESS FIONA!
translation.zh: 我要跟菲欧娜公主讲话

translation.en: - WE WARNED YOU! - OW! OW!
translation.zh: 我们警告过你

translation.en: DID SOMEONE LET THE CAT OUT OF THE BAG?
translation.zh:
他们能逃出法网吗？
还是有人泄密？ 你，资本主义的猪狗！
走开！

translation.en: YOU, CAPITALIST PIG DOGS!
translation.zh:
你，资本主义的猪狗！
走开！

translation.en: - CATNIP! - THAT'S NOT MINE.
translation.zh:
猫薄荷！
那不是我的

translation.en: FIND PRINCESS FIONA!
translation.zh:
且慢，找到菲欧娜公主！
快来！

translation.en: I'M A DONKEY!
translation.zh: 我是驴子！ 告诉她我是她的丈夫，帅克！

translation.en: TELL HER SHREK... I'M HER HUSBAND, SHREK!
translation.zh: 告诉她我是她的丈夫，帅克！

translation.en: QUICK! REWIND IT!
translation.zh: 快！倒回磁带

translation.en: I'M HER HUSBAND, SHREK! OW!
translation.zh: 告诉她我是她的丈夫，帅克！

translation.en: DARLING?
translation.zh: 亲爱的？

translation.en: AH. I THOUGHT I MIGHT FIND YOU HERE.
translation.zh: 我想着能在这里找到你

translation.en: HOW ABOUT A NICE HOT CUP OF TEA BEFORE THE BALL?
translation.zh: 舞会前喝一杯热茶如何？

translation.en: I'M NOT GOING.
translation.zh: 我不去

translation.en: THE WHOLE KINGDOM'S TURNED OUT TO CELEBRATE YOUR MARRIAGE.
translation.zh: 但是整个王国都在庆祝你的婚礼

translation.en: THERE'S JUST ONE PROBLEM. THAT'S NOT MY HUSBAND.
translation.zh:
唯一的问题是
那人不是我的丈夫

translation.en: I MEAN, LOOK AT HIM.
translation.zh: 看看他

translation.en: YES, HE IS A BIT DIFFERENT,
translation.zh: 他是有点不同 不过

translation.en: BUT PEOPLE CHANGE FOR THE ONES THEY LOVE.
translation.zh: 人会为了心爱的人而变化

translation.en: YOU'D BE SURPRISED HOW MUCH I CHANGED FOR YOUR MOTHER.
translation.zh:
你知道我为了妈妈
怎样变化也会惊奇

translation.en: CHANGE?
translation.zh: 变化？

translation.en: HE'S COMPLETELY LOST HIS MIND!
translation.zh: 他完全疯了

translation.en: WHY NOT COME DOWN TO THE BALL AND GIVE HIM ANOTHER CHANCE?
translation.zh: 为何不下来给他多一次机会？

translation.en: I MEAN, YOU MIGHT FIND YOU LIKE THIS NEW SHREK.
translation.zh: 也许你会发现你喜欢新帅克

translation.en: BUT IT'S THE OLD ONE I FELL IN LOVE WITH, DAD.
translation.zh: 但我爱上的是过去的帅克 爸爸

translation.en: I'D GIVE ANYTHING TO HAVE HIM BACK.
translation.zh: 我宁肯要回他

translation.en: DARLING. THAT'S MINE. DECAF.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 那是我的 低咖啡因，否则我无法睡觉

translation.en: OTHERWISE I'M UP ALL NIGHT.
translation.zh: 低咖啡因，否则我无法睡觉

translation.en: THANKS.
translation.zh: 谢谢！

translation.en: [DONKEY] I GOTTA GET OUTTA HERE! YOU CAN'T LOCK US UP LIKE THIS! LET ME GO!
translation.zh:
我要离开这里！
你不能把我们关起来！

translation.en: WHAT ABOUT MY MIRANDA RIGHTS?
translation.zh:
我的权益呢？
让我走！

translation.en: YOU SHOULD SAY I HAVE THE RIGHT TO REMAIN SILENT. NOBODY SAID I HAVE THE RIGHT TO REMAIN SILENT!
translation.zh: 我有权保持沉默！没有人对我讲过

translation.en: YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO REMAIN SILENT.
translation.zh: 你有权保持沉默

translation.en: WHAT YOU LACK IS THE CAPACITY.
translation.zh: 但你缺乏容量

translation.en: I MUST HOLD ON BEFORE I, TOO, GO TOTALLY MAD.
translation.zh: 我也要尽量努力不要发疯

translation.en: SHREK? DONKEY?
translation.zh: 帅克，驴子？

translation.en: TOO LATE.
translation.zh: 太迟了

translation.en: GINGY! PINOCCHIO! GET US OUT OF HERE!
translation.zh:
姜饼人！小木偶
快救我们出去！

translation.en: [♪THEME FROM MISSION IMPOSSIBLE ♪] FIRE IN ZE HOLE!
translation.zh: 洞里有火！

translation.en: LOOK OUT BELOW!
translation.zh: 看看外面！

translation.en: QUICK! TELL A LIE!
translation.zh: 快！撒谎！

translation.en: - WHAT SHOULD I SAY? - ANYTHING, BUT QUICK!
translation.zh:
我要说什么？
随便，但是要快

translation.en: SAY SOMETHING CRAZY LIKE "I'M WEARING LADIES' UNDERWEAR!"
translation.zh: 随便说好像“我穿着女人内裤”

translation.en: I... AM WEARING LADIES' UNDERWEAR.
translation.zh: 我穿着女人内裤

translation.en: - ARE YOU? - I MOST CERTAINLY AM NOT!
translation.zh:
-有吗？
-我绝对没有！

translation.en: IT LOOKS LIKE YOU MOST CERTAINLY AM ARE!
translation.zh: 看来你绝对有！

translation.en: - I AM NOT! - WHAT KIND?
translation.zh:
-我没有！
-哪一种？

translation.en: - IT'S A THONG! - THEY'RE BRIEFS!
translation.zh:
-吊带式‘
-是男式内裤

translation.en: - ARE NOT. - ARE TOO!
translation.zh:
-没有
-有！ -没有
-有！

translation.en: HERE WE GO. HANG TIGHT.
translation.zh: 好了 抓紧

translation.en: [DONKEY] WAIT, WAIT, WAIT! OW! OW! HEY, HEY, HEY!
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: - EXCUSE ME? - WHAT? PUSS!
translation.zh:
-对不起
-什么事？ 对不起 能让我走吗？

translation.en: PARDON ME, WOULD YOU MIND LETTING ME GO?
translation.zh: 对不起 能让我走吗？

translation.en: - SORRY, BOSS. - WE'VE GOT TO STOP THAT KISS!
translation.zh:
抱歉 老板
不要胡来 我们要阻止那个吻

translation.en: I THOUGHT YOU WAS GOING TO LET HER GO.
translation.zh: 我以为你会放她走

translation.en: I WAS, BUT I CAN'T LET THEM DO THIS TO FIONA.
translation.zh:
不错 但我不能
让他们这样待菲欧娜

translation.en: THAT'S WHAT I LIKE TO HEAR. LOOK WHO'S COMING AROUND!
translation.zh:
这样讲话就对了
看看这下谁终于想通了

translation.en: WE'LL NEVER GET IN. THE CASTLE IS GUARDED AND THERE IS A MOAT AND EVERYTHING!
translation.zh:
不可能 我们进不去的
城堡有守卫 而且还有护城河！

translation.en: FOLKS, IT LOOKS LIKE WE'RE UP CHOCOLATE CREEK WITHOUT A POPSICLE STICK.
translation.zh:
看来我们倒霉了
没有冰棒棒

translation.en: WHAT? DO YOU STILL KNOW THE MUFFIN MAN?
translation.zh:
什么？
你还认识松糕人吗？

translation.en: WELL, SURE! HE'S DOWN ON DRURY LANE. WHY?
translation.zh: 当然，他在佐瑞路，怎么？

translation.en: BECAUSE WE'LL NEED FLOUR.
translation.zh: 当然，他在佐瑞路，怎么？ 因为我们要面粉

translation.en: LOTS AND LOTS OF FLOUR.
translation.zh: 很多很多面粉

translation.en: FIRE UP THE OVENS, MUFFIN MAN! WE'VE GOT A BIG ORDER TO FILL!
translation.zh: 点起烤炉，我们接了大订单

translation.en: [GINGY] IT'S ALIVE!
translation.zh: 它活着

translation.en: RUN, RUN, RUN, AS FAST YOU CAN!
translation.zh: 跑跑跑，拼命跑

translation.en: GO, BABY, GO!
translation.zh: 加油，亲爱的

translation.en: THERE IT IS, MONGO! TO THE CASTLE!
translation.zh: 这是芒果，为了城堡

translation.en: NO, YOU GREAT STUPID PASTRY! COME ON!
translation.zh:
不，你这个傻子点心 远巴克咖啡
快来

translation.en: [DONKEY] MONGO! DOWN HERE! LOOK AT THE PONY!
translation.zh: 芒果！下来！来看小马

translation.en: THAT'S RIGHT! FOLLOW THE PRETTY PONY!
translation.zh: 对呀！快来跟漂亮小马一起玩

translation.en: PRETTY PONY WANTS TO PLAY AT THE CASTLE!
translation.zh: 漂亮的小马想在城堡里玩

translation.en: [ANNOUNCER] LADIES AND GENTLEMEN.
translation.zh: 女士先生们，呈现

translation.en: PRESENTING PRINCESS FIONA AND HER NEW HUSBAND, PRINCE SHREK.
translation.zh:
女士先生们，呈现 菲欧娜公主和新婚丈夫
帅克王子

translation.en: SHREK, WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
translation.zh: 帅克，你做什么呢？

translation.en: I'M JUST PLAYING THE PART, FIONA.
translation.zh: 我只在扮演角色

translation.en: IS THAT GLITTER ON YOUR LIPS?
translation.zh: 你抹了亮唇蜜？

translation.en: MM. CHERRY FLAVORED. WANT TO TASTE?
translation.zh: 樱桃味的，你要尝尝吗？

translation.en: - UGGH! WHAT IS WITH YOU? - BUT MUFFIN CAKE...
translation.zh:
你怎么回事？
不过，亲爱的
